tag_list: rebecca-churt, boston-marketer, internet-marketer, social-media, seo, blogger
overview: The Food for Thought blog is a collection of Rebecca’s writings and rants (enjoyable ratio of the two), evaluation and presentation of social politics, and the politics and trends of online media and marketing. Personally, Rebecca is constantly on a quest for intellectual nourishment, and through her blog she hopes to share that with you. Professionally, she is an Online Marketing & Social Media Strategist - someone who specializes in search engine marketing and optimization, blogging and new media strategy.
